title: At COP27, World Leaders Urge Faster Action on Climate Change
description: On the first day of COP27, the U.N. climate talks, world leaders urged each other to move faster to cut the pollution that is warming the planet while recognizing the war in Ukraine’s global energy effects and the unequal effects of climate change to date.
dc:creator: Somini Sengupta
category: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change
media:description: Delegates arriving at the United Nations climate conference in Egypt’s Red Sea resort city of Sharm el Sheikh on Monday.
